articles.title: Mars Express Spacecraft Sets Data Relay Record - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Mars Express, a spacecraft operated by the European Space Agency (ESA), recently conducted tests in which it relayed data gathered by NASA’s Perseverance rover back to Earth. This means the 19-year-old spacecraft has now relayed data for seven different Mars …
articles.content:
ByEuropean Space Agency (ESA)November 12, 2022
